title: Kasia Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Set back in the former seed company building, this restaurant has a cozy European atmosphere.  Vegan choices include a hummus or portobello panini, a garden salad, a daily soup, and an option to make your drink with soy or almond milk. The specials list also often includes vegan dishes.
